title: Emerald Cascade Necklace: A Timeless Haaram for Every Celebration
materials: meticulously hand-set. Features a Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster and antique appeal.
features: This elegant Haaram features a unique cascade design with alternating emeralds and CZ stones along the chain. The pendant showcases a central pear-shaped emerald surrounded by intricate CZ detailing and delicate gold beaded drops. The design blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with a modern sensibility. Features an intricate leaf-like design between the gemstones and cascading CZ stones.
colors: Dominantly gold with vibrant green emerald accents and the dazzling brilliance of white CZ stones. This is a classic and auspicious color combination.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi
or formal events. Also suitable for modern parties
or any celebration where you want to exude sophistication and grace.
description: This Haaram is a stunning statement piece that expertly blends tradition and modernity. The high-quality emeralds and meticulous craftsmanship ensure both beauty and durability. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's natural luster and ensures a lasting heirloom quality. Its versatile design makes it perfect for both traditional and contemporary wear.
